item.title: How Machines Learn: Understanding the Core Concepts of Neural Networks
item.description: Imagine trying to teach a child whoâ€™s never seen the world to recognize a face, feel that fire is hot, or sense when it might rain. How would you do it? For centuries, we thought intelligence required something mystical a soul, consciousness, divine spark.

item.description: Over the past few months Iâ€™ve been building a fully open-source voice agent, exploring the stack end-to-end and learning a ton along the way. Now Iâ€™m ready to share everything I discovered.

item.title: The Other Side of OpenAI: 12 Surprising Stories You Havenâ€™t Heard
item.description: While browsing YouTube, I stumbled across a video titled This Book Changed How I Think About AI. Curious, I clicked and it introduced me to Empire of AI by Karen Hao, a book that dives deep into the evolution of OpenAI.

item.title: Rust Tools That Made Our Dev Team Productive Again
item.description: As regular readers of my blog may know, our primary technology stack is the MERN stack MongoDB, Express, React, and Node.js. On the frontend, we use React with TypeScript; on the backend, Node.js with TypeScript, and MongoDB serves as our database.
